* Make: Acer
* Model: Aspire Timeline 4810TG

=== Karmic ===

Current issues:

* Internal microphone not working - https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/481424
* Wireless connection disconnecting - https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/network-manager/+bug/481432 (Only if WPA-TKIP us used, no issue with WPA2-AES)
* Mouse touchpad on/off switch not working - https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/374459
* DVD eject button not working - https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/412527

The following issues are solved by changing the Display setting in BIOS to dGPU. (not the default one) Basically the Ati card was blacklisted in BIOS causing a lot of problems.

* Both VGA cards are turned on using too much power - https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/435906 
* Ati HD 4330 not working with proprietary Ati driver 
* HDMI port not working
* The Screen brightness setting special keys show the notification properly but it has no effect
